title: I can't download lol
body:
It says ,,The older version of League of Legends cannot be removed.Contact your technical support group.''
I deleted everything about Lol , EVERYTHING   the uninstaller too!   Some help?

replies.body: I can't say for certain why you might be experiencing this issue, but my intuition suggests that your OS is blocking the game files from being modified due to a [permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)issue.  Please [contact player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team can look into this further for you.
